explains: adj. 明智的；头脑精明的；判断正确的

sentences.en: Pundits who want to sound judicious are fond of warning against generalizing.
sentences.cn: 那些想让自己听起来明智的专家喜欢警告不要一概而论。

sentences.en: The president authorizes the judicious use of military force to protect our citizens.
sentences.cn: 总统授权明智动用军队来保护我们的公民。

sentences.en: McCarron said ConAgra's lower estimate stemmed from its more judicious use of hypertension data.
sentences.cn: 麦卡伦说，ConAgra 的较低估计是由于其对高血压数据的更明智使用。
